General.Name: Llama Group S.A.
General.Description: Llama Group SA engages in the digital music business worldwide. The company offers Winamp, an audio player; Bridger, a copyright management solution for artists; and a range of digital and music radios comprising various themed stations. It also provides solutions to artists for their music promotion, distribution, and licensing. Llama Group SA was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.
